message:
Hello every body,

I was implementing a Data Center simulator and when it came to network delay I found this site:

http://wintelguy.com/wanperf.pl

It calculates a valid results regarding the following factors:

Link bandwidth (Mbit/s): 
RTT (millisecond): 
Packet loss (%): 
MTU (Byte): 
L1/L2 frame overhead (Byte): 
TCP/IP (v4) header overhead (Byte): 
TCP window (RWND) size (Byte): 
File size (MByte): 

I need the formula to calculate the throughput and delay time for such I/Ps.
Thanks in advance,
story: Walid Ashraf shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Data center Network Delay calculator
caption: stackoverflow.com
